name: HEARTBURN
description:
Climb, climb, climb to the sky! Burn, burn, burn to the ground!

Collect health against ever-growing gravity until you can't.

HEARTBURN to defy gravity while burning health.

WASD/Arrow Keys: movement (flight in 4 directions is possible during Heartburn)

Space: Heartburn

(Disclaimer: loud volume)

Submission for UCSD VGDC Winter Game Jam 2023:

itch.io/jam/vgdc-wi2023

opengameart.org/content/fire-0
